DescriptionData.Title: 'Mixed Bag' Layer Cake From Moda: Precut 10' Squares
DescriptionData.Description:
Imagine all your scrap bin favorites perfectly coordinated in a bold, playful array of colors and you’ve got a Mixed Bag of the latest must-have modern essentials. Available plain or brushed cuddly soft, this collection is versatile and ready to mix up some fun! 

Layer cakes contain 42 prints from the same collection and each piece of fabric measures 10" x 10"

For full details of this collection please see here

DescriptionData.Title: Charm Pack: SMOOTH Cuddle Squares / Girl Colours, 12 Pieces
DescriptionData.Description:
This charm pack contains 12 squares of plush cuddle fabric. It is a semi-lucky dip bundle and contains "girl" and gender neutral colours. This charm pack is put together by the team here and the fabrics are cut using a professional quilt shop die cutting machine for a professional finish. Each square measures 5" x 5", or 127mm if you prefer it metric.
The colours in the photo are for illustrative purposes only, you may not receive these exact colours. Example colours in these packs are pinks, purples, yellows, greens, reds, white and natural tones.
These squares are perfect for quilting, small projects and appliqué.

DescriptionData.Title: Charm Pack: Lucky Dip Cotton Squares / Girl prints, 12 Pieces
DescriptionData.Description:
This charm pack contains 12 squares of cotton fabric. It is a semi-lucky dip bundle and contains "girl" prints. Fabrics in these bundles are 100% cotton and could come from any of our fabric collections, a real treasure chest! This charm pack is put together by the team here and the fabrics are cut using a professional quilt shop die cutting machine for a professional finish.
Each square measures 5" x 5", or 127mm if you prefer it metric.
These squares are perfct for quilting, small projects and applique.
100% cotton fabric
